tool_description: An API that allows users to view short excerpts of Halsey's songs.
name: Halsey Lyric Snippets
title: Halsey Lyric Snippets

api_list.name: album by {id}
api_list.description: returns album information when searched by {id}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://halsey-lyric-snippets.p.rapidapi.com/album/id/63b88a2bc8450e8550fa6d5c"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "halsey-lyric-snippets.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://halsey-lyric-snippets.p.rapidapi.com/album/id/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "halsey-lyric-snippets.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: random song & song's album information out of {artist}
api_list.description: Returns album information and random song information
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://halsey-lyric-snippets.p.rapidapi.com/Halsey/song/random/info"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "halsey-lyric-snippets.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: random song from a specific {artist} and specified {album}
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves a random song from the specified album by the specified artist and returns it in the response.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://halsey-lyric-snippets.p.rapidapi.com/Halsey/album/Hopeless Fountain Kingdom (Deluxe)/song/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "halsey-lyric-snippets.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: all albums from {artist}
api_list.description:
This endpoint retrieves all albums by the specified artist and returns them in the response.
Use "Halsey" for Halsey's music
